EmailTemplate.name: Global_Email_Welcome Nurture_Q119.3 - .NET Apps Automated
EmailTemplate.subject: .NET Apps Automated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Have you already figured out your cloud strategy? And what about containerization?
Well in case you are still looking for answers, Pivotal is here to help. On-premise data centers, public clouds, or both it doesn’t matter. Let your .NET teams keep their build pipelines just how they like it and push to an automated, highly available platform. Check out the blog post below to learn more!
The One True Platform for All .NET Workloads: Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-one-true-platform-for-all-net-workloads-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=infoq&utm_medium=infoq-emag&utm_campaign=infoq-NET-eMag-2019]]>
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
© 2019 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103.
